CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Homemade
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Assembled by some technician within the Exclusion Zone.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Industrial
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Batteries that were produced in secret laboratories somewhere in Pripyat.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Abnormal
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Batteries that were modified with pieces of gravity-type artifacts.
